description:
Dylan Penn clearly has a thing for guys who star in vampire-related projects, as she is finally going public with her relationship with Vampire Diaries hottie Steven R. McQueen.Dylan Penn对演过吸血鬼题材的男演员有着特殊的感情啊，在和《暮光》男演员罗伯特帕丁森传完绯闻之后，她终于公开了她和《吸血鬼日记》男星Steven R. McQueen的恋情。

Dylan, 22, and Steven, 25, have been rumored to be dating for some time, but now they have been spotted kissing at a public event for the first time when the two puckered up at her dad Sean Penn's charity gala on January 11, according to Us Weekly. 22岁的Dylan和25岁的Steven的绯闻已经传了一段时间了，不过1月11日，他们在Sean Penn的慈善派对上被人看到在公共场所大胆亲吻。

The two posed for photographs at the event together. Later, an onlooker overheard Dylan tell Steven that her feet hurt.他们甚至还公开站在一起拍照，之后又有人听到Dylan跟Steven说自己脚受伤了。

"Oh, really?" Steven asked her as he picked her up in his arms and then kissed her on the lips.“是吗？”说完这句话后Steven搂着她的肩膀，然后亲了她的嘴唇。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》Jeremy演员女友曝光
